resources.string: This app has not been set up for you to use. Contact your IT administrator for help.
To use your work or school account with this app, you must install the Intune Company Portal app. Tap “Go to store” to continue.

To use your work or school account with this app, you must install the Intune Company Portal app from the Google Play Store. The store is not currently enabled on this device. Install and enable the Google Play Store, and then try again.
Your IT department is now helping you protect work or school data in this app. Restart the app to continue.
There was an issue launching your app. Try updating the app or the Intune Company Portal app. If you need help, contact your IT administrator.
Your organization has removed its data associated with this app because the Intune Company Portal data or application was removed. To reconnect, you must sign-in with your work or school account.

Your organization has removed its data associated with this app because the Intune Company Portal data or application was removed. This application will now close. To reconnect, you must sign-in with your work or school account.
